lyrics:
I've got to see you, somehow
Not tomorrow, right now
I know it's late, whoa I can't wait
So come on and steal away
Please, steal away

Now, don't start thinking, tryin' to make up your mind
Your folk are sleeping, let's not waste any time
I know it's late, whoa I can't wait
So come on and steal away
Please, steal away

I know it's wrong asking this of you
There's no other way I can be with you
If only your folk would approve
A thing like this we wouldn't have to do

No, no, I won't tell anybody else
I'll keep it to myself
I know it's late (It's late)
Whoa, I can't wait
So come on and steal away
Please, steal away

'Cause I need you, yes I do (Steal away)
Oh, by my side (Steal away)
Yes, oh still I need you (Steal away)
I need you, I need you to be my guide (Steal away)
